did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Letters, clippings, and 1 photograph relating to Harriet Kernan's participation in the Vassar College Debate Council's 1924 competition with the Princeton debate team.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Harriet Kernan (VC '24) was a member of the Vassar College Debate Council. On April 25, 1924, she participated in Vassar's victory over the Princeton University debate team. Born in 1902, she died on November 25, 1984, in Old Greenwich, CT.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of letters, clippings, and 1 photograph relating to Harriet Kernan's participation in the Vassar College Debate Council's 1924 competition with the Princeton debate team. The letters include one from Eleanor Roosevelt and one from Herbert Claiborne Pell, Jr., both congratulating Kernan for her contribution to Vassar's victory.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

odd.head: Encoding Information
odd.p: Encoded by Mark Seidl, March 2014. Updated by Mark Seidl, May 2014.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Collection processed by Mark Seidl, March 2014

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Karl Brautigam, son of Harriet Kernan, February 18, 2014.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Harriet Kernan Papers, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: All of the materials in this collection are mounted and framed.
